document.full_text: as katie couric and the network negotiate how to end her five-year run as anchor of 'cbs evening news,' interviews show that her hiring was part of a larger experiment to lift the newscast's ratings.
document.title: couric's rocky path to a likely parting with cbs
lines_and_colors: as katie couric and the network negotiate how to end her five-year run as anchor of 'cbs evening news,' interviews show that her hiring was part of a larger experiment to lift the newscast's ratings.
